name: Mash Madness
description:
Mash Madness is a fast paced space shooter arcade.

It's extremely satisfying on a mechanical keyboard!

The controls are fully remap-able so you can choose which buttons deserve punishment.  After you can't take the repeating soundtrack any further, lower the volume, open your favorite music app,   and play whatever music you like mashing to (it's encouraged).

Attributions:

Music:

RetroFuture Nasty by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4279-retrofuture-nasty

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

Precipice by Twin Musicom (twinmusicom.org)

Good For Nothing Safety by Twin Musicom (twinmusicom.org)

Font:

Andrew Wilson font loaded https://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/loaded

All other assets are Homemade.

I wish you happy mashing :)
